description: This file defines a Flutter widget named CategoryPieChart that displays a pie chart representing the breakdown of spending categories, using the fl_chart package for visualization.

classes.name: CategoryPieChart
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a pie chart of spending breakdown per category.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the pie chart, calculating total spent and configuring the chart sections.

methods.name: _chartColor
methods.description: Returns a color from a predefined palette based on the index, adjusted for context.
